tip.no_cluster: Your tenant has not assigned any cluster resources!
tip.no_cluster_tip: You can contact the system administrator to allocate cluster resources to your tenants
tip.no_tenant: You don't belong to any tenant yet!
tip.no_tenant_tip: You can contact an administrator of a tenant to invite you to join a tenant or create a new tenant
tip.leave_tenant: You have quit the current tenant, please select the tenant again!
tip.leave_tenant_tip: You can contact the tenant administrator to invite you to rejoin the tenant
